mapper.select: SELECT h.hotel_name, h.category, hp.url, SUBSTR(addr1, 7, INSTR(addr1, '구') -6) as addr FROM hotel h INNER JOIN hotel_picture hp ON h.hotel_id = hp.hotel_id WHERE h.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND hp.type = 'title'

select h.hotel_name, hi.hotel_information, hp.url, h.hotel_id from hotel h inner join hotel_info hi on h.hotel_id = hi.hotel_id inner join hotel_picture hp on h.hotel_id = hp.hotel_id where (hotel_name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' or addr1 like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%') and hp.type = 'title'

select count(*) from reservation
where check_in < #{check_out} and check_out > #{check_in} and hotel_id = #{hotel_id}
